mapper.select: SELECT a.contract_hash AS contractHash, a.name AS name, a.creator AS creator, a.description as description, a.logo as logo, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.contact_info as contactInfo, b.total_supply as totalSupply, b.decimals as decimals, b.symbol as symbol, a.address_count as addressCount, a.tx_count as txCount FROM tbl_contract a, tbl_oep4 b where a.contract_hash = b.contract_hash order by a.create_time desc

SELECT a.contract_hash AS contractHash, a.name AS name, a.abi as abi, a.code as code, a.source_code as sourceCode, a.category as category, a.creator AS creator, a.description as description, a.logo as logo, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.contact_info as contactInfo, a.type as type, a.ong_sum as ongSum, a.ont_sum as ontSum, a.token_sum as tokenSum, a.address_count as addressCount, a.tx_count as txCount, b.total_supply as totalSupply, b.decimals as decimals, b.symbol as symbol FROM tbl_contract a, tbl_oep4 b where a.contract_hash = b.contract_hash and b.contract_hash = #{contractHash}
